green_flag.subject: Your order confirmation â€“ Order #123456
green_flag.body: Thank you for your order! Your order #[123456] has been successfully placed and will be delivered by [date].

green_flag.subject: Reminder: Your electricity bill is available
green_flag.body: Your new electricity bill is available. Please log in to your account to view and pay before the due date.

green_flag.subject: Security update: Recent login to your account
green_flag.body: A new login was detected from: [Device Type, Location]. If this was you, no action is needed. If not, change your password immediately.

green_flag.subject: We've updated our privacy policy
green_flag.body: We've updated our privacy policy to better serve you. The new terms take effect on [date].
green_flag.ending: For more details, visit our website.

green_flag.subject: Your Netflix subscription has been renewed
green_flag.body: Your monthly Netflix subscription has been successfully renewed. Thank you for being a valued member!
green_flag.ending: For any questions, visit our help center.

red_flag.subject: Urgent! Your PayPal account is locked
red_flag.body: We have detected suspicious activity on your account. Click the link below to verify your identity immediately.
red_flag.ending: If you fail to do so within 24 hours, your account will be permanently locked.

red_flag.subject: Congratulations! You've won an iPhone 15!
red_flag.body: You are the lucky winner of our giveaway! Click the link below to claim your free iPhone 15.

red_flag.subject: Warning: Your personal data has been leaked!
red_flag.body: Your personal information has been exposed. Protect your privacy now by clicking the button below.
red_flag.ending: Do not ignore this, it is urgent.

red_flag.subject: Your package could not be delivered
red_flag.body: Your package could not be delivered due to an address error. Please confirm your address and pay a reshipping fee.
red_flag.ending: If you do not confirm, the package will be returned.

red_flag.subject: Netflix: Your payment has failed
red_flag.body: Your recent payment attempt was unsuccessful. Please update your payment details immediately to avoid service interruption.
red_flag.ending: Click below to update your payment information.
